name: Loot Nubs (Slambert)
description:
Lead your nubs into unknown territory in search of Gold Gems and Shiny loot, then expand your kingdom so that one day you and your tiny minions may seize all of the treasure in the world.

Build your base with the gold you horde from your adventures, construct buildings to train your Nubs in the art of combat, then Lead your force into to world to fight enemies, monsters and to retrieve magical Loot.

This a mobile game for android that I have put it up for people to play test and give me feedback on what they enjoyed or didn't.

This is a group project so any praise or criticism will be passed on.

OK the final build is now up for both android and PC. Hope you enjoy it.
